name: Mocedades
description: '''Mocedades''' ({{IPA|es|moθeˈðaðes}}) is a Spanish singing group from the [[Basque Country (autonomous community)|Basque Country]], who represented [[Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest]] in [[Eurovision Song Contest 1973|1973]] with the hit song "[[Eres tú]]". Since June 2014, ''Mocedades'' has been the name of two bands: one with [[Izaskun Uranga]] as its leader and the other with [[Javier Garay]]. A third group, [[El Consorcio]], is composed of former Mocedades members who left the group but have continued a career together outside the Mocedades brand.
